alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Chariton; Cooper; Howard; Linn; Randolph; Saline (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Randolph, Chariton, southeastern Linn, southeastern Carroll, Howard, central Saline and Cooper Counties through 330 AM CST... At 300 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bosworth to 10 miles southeast of Marshall to near Otterville. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marshall, Boonville, Fayette, Marceline, Slater, Salisbury, Huntsville, Glasgow, New Franklin, Brunswick, Pilot Grove, Higbee, Keytesville, Bucklin, Bunceton, Bosworth, Armstrong, Wakenda, Prairie Home and Gilliam. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 86 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Chariton; Cooper; Howard; Linn; Randolph; Saline
